title: Software Engineer (Remote)
description:
Join Outlier AI as a Software Engineer and contribute to cutting-edge AI development. In this remote position, you'll enhance AI capabilities by evaluating and refining AI-generated code. You'll enjoy flexible scheduling and weekly compensation while working on innovative technology projects.

**Key Responsibilities:**
• Evaluate AI-generated code for accuracy, efficiency, and security compliance
• Improve and optimize AI-generated code across multiple programming languages
• Develop testing protocols to assess AI model performance
• Collaborate with AI research teams to provide technical feedback
• Document evaluation processes and improvement recommendations
• Maintain version control of all code revisions and enhancements

**Required Qualifications:**
• Expertise in at least two programming languages: JavaScript, Python, Go, Java, TypeScript, or C++
• Professional experience maintaining production-level software systems
• Advanced proficiency with Git or similar version control platforms
• Demonstrated ability in code review, debugging, and large-scale codebase analysis
• Exceptional attention to detail in technical assessments
• Clear communication of technical feedback in English
requirements: Proficiency in at least two programming languages: JavaScript, Python, Go, Java, TypeScript, or C++
Professional experience maintaining production-grade software
Strong knowledge of Git (or similar version control systems)
Experience with code reviews, debugging, and analyzing large codebases
Strong attention to detail and ability to communicate technical feedback clearly
English proficiency required

title: Customer Care Executive
location: Bangalore , Chennai , Gurgaon , Hyderabad , Kochi , Mumbai , Navi Mumbai , Noida , Pune
description:
Become a Customer Care Executive at Wipro and serve as the frontline representative for one of India's leading IT companies. You'll resolve customer inquiries across multiple channels while developing essential customer service skills in a professional corporate environment.

**Key Responsibilities:**
• Handle customer inquiries via phone, email, and chat channels
• Resolve product/service issues and provide effective solutions
• Maintain detailed records of customer interactions
• Identify and escalate priority issues to appropriate teams
• Follow communication protocols and service standards
• Achieve performance targets for call handling and resolution

**Required Qualifications:**
• Minimum educational qualification: 12th pass certificate
• Age between 18 to 30 years
• Excellent verbal/written communication in English + one regional language
• Ability to understand customer needs and provide empathetic support

**Preferred Qualifications:**
• Previous customer service or sales experience
• Proficiency with Excel and basic office software
requirements: Minimum educational qualification: 12th pass.
Age between 18 to 30 years.
Strong verbal and written communication skills in English and one regional language (Hindi, Marathi, Tamil, Telugu, Malayalam, or Kannada).
Ability to empathize with customers and resolve queries efficiently.
Prior experience in customer service or sales will be advantageous.
Proficiency in Excel and basic computer skills preferred.

title: Digital Marketing Associate
description:
Advance your digital marketing career with Indofit Solutions as a Digital Marketing Associate. You'll develop and execute marketing campaigns across digital channels while analyzing performance metrics to drive business growth in a fast-paced environment.

**Key Responsibilities:**
• Create and manage social media marketing campaigns
• Implement SEO strategies to improve organic visibility
• Develop email marketing campaigns and automation workflows
• Analyze campaign performance using analytics tools
• Generate performance reports with actionable insights
• Collaborate with content and design teams for asset creation

**Required Qualifications:**
• Bachelor's degree in marketing, communications, or related field
• 2+ years experience in digital marketing execution
• Comprehensive knowledge of digital marketing channels
• Proficiency with social media platforms and email marketing
• Experience with Google Analytics and campaign tracking
• Excellent written and verbal communication abilities

**Preferred Skills:**
• Experience with paid advertising platforms
• Content creation and basic design skills
• Knowledge of marketing automation tools
requirements: Bachelor's degree in marketing, communications, or a related field.
2+ years of experience in digital marketing.
Strong understanding of digital marketing principles and best practices.
Proficiency in social media marketing, email marketing, and SEO.
Experience with analytics tools, such as Google Analytics.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Strong organizational and time management skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Passion for digital marketing and a desire to stay up-to-date on the latest trends.

title: .Net MVC Developers
description:
Join Unnati Informatics as a .Net MVC Developer to build robust web applications using Microsoft technologies. You'll participate in full development lifecycle activities while creating scalable solutions for diverse business requirements.

**Key Responsibilities:**
• Develop web applications using ASP.NET MVC framework
• Design and implement database solutions with SQL Server
• Create RESTful APIs for system integration
• Write clean, maintainable code following best practices
• Perform code reviews and provide technical feedback
• Troubleshoot and resolve application issues

**Required Qualifications:**
• 1.5+ years hands-on ASP.NET MVC 4+ development
• Strong C#, .NET Framework, and Entity Framework skills
• SQL Server experience with T-SQL and stored procedures
• Solid OOP understanding and design pattern knowledge
• Frontend integration using JavaScript, jQuery, and Bootstrap
• RESTful API development experience

**Preferred Skills:**
• Version control systems (Git/TFS)
• Dependency injection frameworks
• Cloud platform experience
requirements: 1.5+ years of hands-on experience in ASP.NET MVC 4+ development.
Strong proficiency in C#, .NET Framework, Entity Framework, and LINQ.
Experience working with SQL Server (T-SQL, Stored Procedures, Functions, Triggers, etc.).
Solid understanding of OOP (Object-Oriented Programming) and Design Patterns.
Proficiency in JavaScript, jQuery, AJAX, and Bootstrap for frontend integration.
Experience with RESTful API development and integration.
Familiarity with Version Control Systems (e.g., Git, TFS).
Knowledge of dependency injection frameworks (e.g., Autofac, Ninject) is a plus.
Ability to write clean, scalable, and efficient code.
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

title: Customer Service Representative
description:
Serve as a Customer Service Representative at Etech Global Services, where you'll be the primary point of contact for customer inquiries. You'll develop problem-solving skills while maintaining high customer satisfaction in a supportive team environment.

**Key Responsibilities:**
• Handle customer inquiries via multiple channels
• Resolve product/service issues efficiently
• Maintain accurate customer interaction records
• Identify improvement opportunities in service delivery
• Achieve performance metrics for quality and efficiency
• Collaborate with teams for issue resolution

**Required Qualifications:**
• High secondary diploma with 3 years relevant experience OR
• Any graduate degree with 1 year relevant experience
• Proficiency with Microsoft Office and internet tools
• Understanding of business operations and data analysis
• Strong problem-solving and communication abilities

**Preferred Skills:**
• Customer relationship management
• Technical support experience
• Sales and upselling techniques
requirements: High secondary or 10+2 diploma with 3 years of experience in a related field; OR
Any stream graduate degree with 1 year of experience.
Strong computer skills, especially proficiency in Microsoft Office, Outlook, and other internet-based tools.
Strong understanding of business operations, including spreadsheet management, data analysis, and identifying trends.

title: Finance Executive
description:
Become a Finance Executive at Swift Elite Cars and manage critical financial operations. You'll maintain financial records and reports while ensuring compliance in a dynamic automotive business environment.

**Key Responsibilities:**
• Prepare and maintain accounting records
• Manage accounts payable/receivable processes
• Generate financial statements and reports
• Conduct bank reconciliations
• Assist with budgeting and forecasting
• Ensure tax compliance and filing
• Analyze financial data for trends

**Required Qualifications:**
• Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance or related
• Proven accounting/finance experience
• Strong accounting principles knowledge
• Proficiency in Tally and MS Office (Excel)
• Attention to detail and accuracy
• Analytical and problem-solving abilities

**Preferred Qualifications:**
• Chartered Accountant qualification
• Automotive industry experience
• Audit and compliance knowledge
requirements: Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field.
Proven experience in accounting or finance role.
Experience with Chartered Accountant (preferred).
Strong knowledge of accounting principles and practices.
Proficiency in accounting software, Tally and MS Office, particularly Excel.
Excellent attention to detail and accuracy.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Effective communication and interpersonal skills.
Ability to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines.

title: Senior Engineer
description:
Join Advent Global Solutions as a Senior Engineer specializing in Power Platform development. You'll create business solutions using Microsoft technologies while working in agile environments to deliver enterprise-grade applications.

**Key Responsibilities:**
• Design and develop Power Platform solutions
• Create Power Apps and Power Automate workflows
• Implement business process automation
• Collaborate with stakeholders on requirements
• Conduct solution testing and deployment
• Provide technical guidance to junior team members
• Maintain solution documentation

**Required Qualifications:**
• Microsoft Power Platform certification
• Experience in Power Apps development
• Azure DevOps basic knowledge
• Scrum team collaboration experience
• Problem-solving and analytical abilities

**Preferred Skills:**
• Power BI development
• Azure integration services
• Custom connector development
requirements: Has a Microsoft certification relevant to developers who focus on Power Platform and Power Apps development and/or architecture
Basic knowledge and experience of using Azure DevOps
Experience working in a Scrum team environment

title: Graphic Designer
description:
Create compelling visual experiences as a Graphic Designer at MoltonRox. You'll transform product concepts into stunning visual representations while developing assets for digital platforms in a creative remote environment.

**Key Responsibilities:**
• Create high-quality product mockups and visualizations
• Develop marketing assets for digital platforms
• Design illustrations and 3D-style renderings
• Maintain brand consistency across designs
• Collaborate with marketing and product teams
• Iterate designs based on feedback
• Manage multiple design projects simultaneously

**Required Qualifications:**
• Expertise in Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator
• Portfolio demonstrating mockup and visualization skills
• Creative approach to product presentation
• Attention to detail in visual execution
• Ability to interpret creative briefs

**Preferred Skills:**
• 3D rendering tool experience
• Motion graphics knowledge
• UI/UX design principles
requirements: Strong command of Adobe Photoshop and Adobe Illustrator
Proven experience in mockup design, illustration, and product visualization
A creative portfolio showcasing your best design work (mockups, product design, etc.)
Basic understanding of 3D rendering tools (optional but a big plus!)

title: Senior Sales Executive
description:
Advance your sales career as a Senior Sales Executive at NaukriDaddy. You'll drive B2C sales performance while working with talented professionals in a target-oriented environment with rapid growth potential.

**Key Responsibilities:**
• Drive sales targets for educational products/services
• Conduct sales presentations and product demonstrations
• Manage entire sales cycle from lead to closure
• Build and maintain client relationships
• Achieve monthly/quarterly sales objectives
• Provide market feedback to product teams
• Mentor junior sales representatives

**Required Qualifications:**
• Proven B2C sales performance record
• Excellent English communication skills
• Strong phone presence and closing ability
• Self-motivated and target-driven mindset
• 1+ years education industry experience
• Ability to work in performance-driven environments

**Preferred Skills:**
• EdTech product knowledge
• CRM system experience
• Consultative sales techniques
requirements: Demonstrated experience of driving top results in B2C Sales.
Excellent communication skills and strong mastery over written and verbal English
Strong phone presence and experience in closing sales over the phone.
Highly self motivated able to work with target driven mindset
Minimum 1+ years experience in similar roles in education and related industries.

title: Network Engineer
description:
Design and maintain network infrastructure as a Network Engineer with The Rojgaar. You'll ensure network reliability and security while implementing cutting-edge networking solutions across diverse environments.

**Key Responsibilities:**
• Design and deploy network infrastructure
• Configure routers, switches, and firewalls
• Monitor network performance and security
• Troubleshoot network connectivity issues
• Implement network security protocols
• Conduct quality assurance checks
• Maintain network documentation

**Required Qualifications:**
• BE/BTech in ECE, CS, IT or EE (AICTE/UGC recognized)
• 1+ year IT/telecom experience (degree holders)
• 6+ years experience (diploma holders)
• Networking protocol knowledge (TCP/IP, DNS, DHCP)
• Network security fundamentals
• Problem-solving and analytical abilities

**Preferred Skills:**
• Cisco certification (CCNA/CCNP)
• Cloud networking experience
• SD-WAN implementation
requirements: BE/BTech degree in Electronics & Communication, Computer Science, Information Technology, or Electrical & Electronics (recognized by AICTE/UGC/Ministry of HRD).
Minimum 1 year of relevant post-qualification experience in IT/Telecommunication Systems/Optical Fibres for degree holders.
For Diploma holders (recognized by AICTE/UGC/Ministry of HRD), a minimum of 6 years of post-qualification experience in the relevant field is required.

title: PHP Developer
description:
Excel as a PHP Developer at Codeft Digital, creating robust web applications. You'll optimize performance and scalability while balancing development and support tasks in a collaborative technical environment.

**Key Responsibilities:**
• Develop and maintain PHP-based web applications
• Optimize application performance and scalability
• Debug and resolve technical issues
• Implement Laravel/CodeIgniter framework solutions
• Identify system bottlenecks and improvements
• Balance feature development with support tasks
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams

**Required Qualifications:**
• Advanced PHP and MySQL development skills
• Laravel and CodeIgniter framework expertise
• Debugging and performance optimization experience
• Resource-intensive application architecture knowledge
• Problem-solving and analytical abilities
• Independent and collaborative work approach
• Attention to technical detail

**Preferred Skills:**
• API development and integration
• Cloud deployment experience
• Frontend technology proficiency
requirements: Expertise in PHP, MySQL, and related web technologies.
Strong experience in debugging, performance optimisation, and scalability.
Familiarity with resource-intensive application architectures.
Hands-on experience with Laravel and CodeIgniter frameworks.
Ability to identify potential bottlenecks and provide innovative solutions.
Adaptability to balance support and development tasks effectively.
Ability to work independently and collaboratively in teams.
Exceptional problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

title: Human Resource Executive
description:
Manage HR operations as a Human Resource Executive at Panacorp Software Solution. You'll handle recruitment, payroll, and compliance while developing HR processes in a growing software company.

**Key Responsibilities:**
• Manage end-to-end recruitment processes
• Administer payroll and benefits programs
• Ensure compliance with labor regulations
• Resolve employee relations matters
• Maintain HR records and documentation
• Implement HR policies and procedures
• Support performance management systems

**Required Qualifications:**
• Strong communication and leadership abilities
• Recruitment and payroll processing experience
• Conflict resolution and problem-solving skills
• Knowledge of labor laws and HR practices
• HR software proficiency (HRMS, payroll tools)
• Organizational and multitasking capabilities

**Preferred Skills:**
• HR certification (SHRM, HRCI)
• Technical industry recruitment
• Employee engagement strategies
requirements: Strong communication and leadership skills.
Experience in HR processes (recruitment, payroll, compliance).
Problem-solving and conflict-resolution abilities.
Knowledge of labor laws and HR best practices.
Proficient in HR software (e.g., HRMS, payroll tools).
